scripts.build:tokens: npm run split:tokens && npm run build:tokens:tailwind && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join('src','tokens');const dst='dist';fs.rmSync(dst,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(dst,{recursive:true});for (const f of fs.readdirSync(src)){if(f.startsWith('sd-')&&f.endsWith('.json')){fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,f),path.join(dst,f));}}console.log('Collected sd-*.json to dist');"
